SFRRI 2023 Award Lectures

* [Prof. Maret Traber](https://lpi.oregonstate.edu/faculty-staff/maret-traber) – Trevor Slater Award
* [Prof. Helmut Sies](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helmut_Sies) – Alberto Boveris Award
* [Prof. Jose Vina](https://www.uv.es/freshage/jose-vina.html) – Lester Packer Award
